message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor to start.
Your turn, Alice. I'm feeling generous, but let's be realistic. This offer won't be as good next round.
Bob, time is running out and the value is decreasing. I'll take a little less this round, but this is my final offer.
Alice, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest and ensures we both benefit.  This is my final offer.
